radiographic_examinations.findings: Right pneumothorax, lungs with ground glass appearance, elevation of the right hemidiaphragm, and scoliosis.
Extreme arterial tortuosity involving the aortic arch, supra-aortic trunks, pulmonary branches, and descending aorta; dilation of the ascending aorta (27 mm) and aortic root (22 mm).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Dilation of the aneurysm had progressed despite treatment.
